item.title: Queer Theology Reading List
item.description: Books # Marcella Althaus-Reid. The Queer God. New York, NY: Routledge, 2003. Susannah Cornwall. Controversies in Queer Theology. London, UK: SCM Press, 2011. Michel Foucault. The History of Sexuality, Volume 1. (you can read this online / download as pdf here) Jay Emerson Johnson. Peculiar Faith: Queer Theology for Christian Witness. New York, NY: Seabury Books, 2014. Dale B. Martin. Sex and the Single Savior: Gender and Sexuality in Biblical Interpretation.
